notes: Very modern and newly renovated apartment with pristine condition, polished tile floors, modern kitchen with built-in appliances, split AC units, and two luxurious bathrooms with bathtubs and glass partitions. Excellent natural light from floor-to-ceiling balcony windows. Baby safety concerns include balcony with decorative iron railings that a child could potentially climb, and hard tile floors throughout. The unit is unfurnished and very clean with no visible red flags.
